project_id.description: The Id of the Player Project this configuration refers to

student.description: The Id of the Player Team to assign a virtual machine to

user_id.description: The Id of the User who launched this Workspace

username.description: The name of the User who launched this Workspace

vsphere_datastore.description: The name of the datastore to deploy this configuration to

vsphere_host_name.description: The name of the Host to deploy this configuration to
